RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 1 1M Dirt CR: 60. Maiden Claiming Purse 9000. FOR MAIDENS, THREE, FOUR, FIVE, AND SIX YEARS OLD. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 125 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: BARRY'S MUSIC had sharp speed, opened a commanding lead to far turn, holding on at the end. BUDDHA BOY chased runaway winner to the stretch, cutting into the lead late. GRASSROOTS no speed to far turn, ran on outside to just miss place spot. EL MIC TIESUN no speed to far turn, runnig on in the stretch to cut the gap. NOBLES FEELINGS raced evenly with nothing left in the stretch run. SAMURAI ISLAND inside run to the half, went wrong, pulled up and wlaked off with the outrider.

ENTRY.NAME: Samurai Island
ENTRY.COMMENT: inside run to the half, went wrong, pulled up, walked off

ENTRY.NAME: Buddha Boy
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased runaway winner to the stretch, cutting into the lead late

ENTRY.NAME: Nobles Feelings
ENTRY.COMMENT: raced evenly with nothing left in the stretch run

ENTRY.NAME: Barry's Music
ENTRY.COMMENT: sharp speed, opened a commanding lead, holding on at the end

ENTRY.NAME: El Mic Tiesun
ENTRY.COMMENT: no speed to far turn, runnig on in the stretch to cut the gap

ENTRY.NAME: Grassroots
ENTRY.COMMENT: no speed to far turn, ran on outside to just miss place spot

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 2 1M Dirt CR: 79. Starter Allowance Purse 17900. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE STARTED FOR A CLAIMING PRICE OF $10,000 OR LESS IN 2022 - 2023. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 125 lbs. Non-winners Of Two Races At A Mile Or Over Since April 12, 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. Such A R ace Since Then Allowed 4 lbs. (Claiming Races For $6,250 Or Less Not Considered In Allowances) (Preference To Horses That Have Not Started For Less Than $7,500 In Last 5 Starts)(Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SILKY WARRIOR (IRE) had an awkward start, went up four wide early, continued on in front to far turn, had to swerve out on the far turn, continued all out to the wire under stout handling. FOOT RUB LOVE inside speed to the front, dueled to the half, stayed game in the late going while outgamed to the wire.. ADDISON had an awkward start, never far back throughout, swerved out far turn avonded stricken horse and ran on evenly. SINGSONG BIRD with leader to the half, went wrong into the far turn, lost rider and vanned off.

ENTRY.NAME: Foot Rub Love
ENTRY.COMMENT: inside speed to the front, dueled to the half, stayed game late

ENTRY.NAME: Addison
ENTRY.COMMENT: awkward start, never far back throughout, swerved out far turn

ENTRY.NAME: Silky Warrior (IRE)
ENTRY.COMMENT: awkward start, four wide early, swerved out far turn, all out

ENTRY.NAME: Singsong Bird
ENTRY.COMMENT: with leader to the half, went wrong into the far turn, lost rider

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 3 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 80. Allowance Purse 18000. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 125 lbs. Non-winners Of Two Races Since April 12, 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since Then Allowed 4 lbs. (Claiming Races Not Considered In Allowances) (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: BLEST LIFE confidently handled throughout, roused with vigorous hand urging late in an impressive effort. SPARE A DIME chased winner to the stretch, battled hard in the final furlong to no avail while well best of the rest. GOSHEN raced evenly from inside throughout and never a real menace. MOONSHINE DREAMER always trailed while never a threat throughout.

ENTRY.NAME: Blest Life
ENTRY.COMMENT: confidently handled throughout with vigorous hand urging late

ENTRY.NAME: Goshen
ENTRY.COMMENT: raced evenly from inside throughoutnever a real menace

ENTRY.NAME: Spare a Dime
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased winner to the stretch, battled hard while best of the rest

ENTRY.NAME: Moonshine Dreamer
ENTRY.COMMENT: alwayd trailed while never a threat throughout

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 4 1M Dirt CR: 86. Allowance Optional Claiming Purse 18800. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON A RACE OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, OPTIONAL, OR STARTER IN 2023 OR CLAIMING PRICE $25,000. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 125 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since April 12, 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. Such A Race Since Then Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $25,000 (Claiming Races For $15,000 Or Less Not Considered In Allowances) (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: JUNGLE JUICE (IRE) quick to the front while well handled throughout and ridden out to the wire. TELLER TO SING chased winner thoughout, challenged far turn with no late kick while held at bay to the finish. PARFAIT had an awkward start from the gate, galloped along with no gain in the stretch run.

ENTRY.NAME: Parfait
ENTRY.COMMENT: awk start from the gate, galloped along with no gain in the lane

ENTRY.NAME: Jungle Juice (IRE)
ENTRY.COMMENT: quick to the front well handled throughout and ridden out to wire

ENTRY.NAME: Teller to Sing
ENTRY.OWNER: Pee Wee's and Friends Racing Stables LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased winner throughout, challenged far turn, no late kick

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 5 6F Dirt CR: 72. Allowance Purse 27100. FOR REGISTERED OHIO BRED FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 125 lbs. Non-winners Of Two Races Since April 12, 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since Then Allowed 4 lbs. (Claiming Race s For $17,500 Or Less Not Considered In Allowances) (Preference To Horses That Have Not Started For Less Than $15,000).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SENORA PANQUEQUES settled early on outside, rushed up to the lead, raced along in the stretch on the wrong lead and still cleared to the wire under stout handling. WILDCAT LADY broke to the front, led to the half, challenged far turn no match. LINE DANCER inside to far turn, angled out with a late run for third spot. EARLY BLOOMER wide run to the far turn with brief speed but could not keep up.

ENTRY.NAME: Line Dancer
ENTRY.COMMENT: inside to far turn, angled out with a late run for third spot

ENTRY.NAME: Senora Panqueques
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled early on outside, rushed up to the lead, wrong lead clear

ENTRY.NAME: Wildcat Lady
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke to the front, led to the half, challenged far turn no match

ENTRY.NAME: Early Bloomer
ENTRY.OWNER: JK Stable LLC and Barker Scott W
ENTRY.COMMENT: wide run to the far turn with brief speed, could not keep up

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 6 6F Dirt CR: 65. Maiden Claiming Purse 13000. FOR MAIDENS, FILLIES AND MARES THREE, FOUR, FIVE, AND SIX YEARS OLD. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 125 lbs. Claiming Price $12,500 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: TOTO'SRUBYSLIPPERS awkward from the gate, settled in nicely,raced to the front and stayed well clear of the field in the stretch run while ridden out. BODIEFUL chased winner through out, no match for the winner while best of the rest. FABULOUS PHILLY chased top pair entire trip with no late response when needed. CAPTIVE STAR always trailed and dropped far back in the stretch run.

ENTRY.NAME: Fabulous Philly
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased to pair entire trip with no late response when needed

ENTRY.NAME: Toto'srubyslippers
ENTRY.COMMENT: awkward from the gate, settled in raced to the front, ridden out

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: David M. Clay & Deborah G. Clay

ENTRY.NAME: Captive Star
ENTRY.COMMENT: always trailed and dropped far back in the stretch run

ENTRY.NAME: Bodieful
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased winner through out while no match while best of the rest

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 7 6F Dirt CR: 62. Maiden Claiming Purse 13600. FOR MAIDENS, THREE, FOUR, FIVE, AND SIX YEARS OLD. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 125 lbs. Claiming Price $12,500 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: HASTY STRIKE inside speed while well rated, roused into the stretch, cleared off with a sharp effort. SMART DRESSER bobbled from the gate, regrouped to the turn, no match to wire. PAST IMPERATIVE tried to stay with winner to the turn, no avail and settled for show. ECCENTRICO between horses early on, faded back quickly while no factor.

ENTRY.NAME: Hasty Strike
ENTRY.COMMENT: inside speed while well rated, roused into the stretch, cleared

ENTRY.NAME: Past Imperative
ENTRY.COMMENT: tried to stay with winner to the turn, no avail, settled for show

ENTRY.NAME: Eccentrico
ENTRY.COMMENT: between horses early on, faded back quickly while no factor

ENTRY.NAME: Smart Dresser
ENTRY.OWNER: Blazing Meadows Farm LLC Hertrich III Frederick and Fielding John D
ENTRY.COMMENT: bobbled from the gate, regrouped to the turn, no match to wire

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 8 1M Dirt CR: 71. Claiming Purse 9000. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 125 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since April 12, 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred ).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: ENDLESS settled nicely thru the first turn, rallied along outside into the stretch with a perfect trip while clear to the wire in a good effort. GORILLA GIRL broke sharp, raced three wide entire trip and came running between horses, angled out while racing on in the late stretch for the place spot gamely. SOPHISTICATED chased pace to deep stretch, hooked leader in the drive, checked hard in the final stages and could not go on from that point. YOUDEVILYOUCECILIA speed to the front from inside, went clear to the stretch, hooked at that point and wilted in the final furlong. MAGESTAL BASTIDA trailed to the far turn, passed a couple in the stretch run. KNELCOCK saved ground with a rail trip to no avail while evenly in the stretch run. EASY IS GOOD good position from inside to the half but faded from far turn.

ENTRY.NAME: Easy Is Good
ENTRY.COMMENT: good position from inside to the half, faded from far turn

ENTRY.NAME: Youdevilyoucecilia
ENTRY.COMMENT: speed to the front from inside, clear to stretch, hooked, wilted

ENTRY.NAME: Magestal Bastida
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed to the far turn, passed a couple in the stetch run

ENTRY.NAME: Knelcock
ENTRY.COMMENT: saved ground with a rail trip to no avail in the stretch run

ENTRY.NAME: Sophisticated
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased pace to deep stretch, hooked leader checked hard late

ENTRY.NAME: Gorilla Girl
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke sharp, raced three wide entire trip, stayed on gamley

ENTRY.NAME: Endless
ENTRY.OWNER: Cox Christopher J and Adams Janey
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled nicely thru the first turn, rallied with a perfect trip
